subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Short Track Skating
Speedskating
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The American speedskater was disqualified from the 500-meter final but won his eighth Winter Olympics medal after the U.S. took third in the 5,000-meter relay.
snippet: The American speedskater was disqualified from the 500-meter final but won his eighth Winter Olympics medal after the U.S. took third in the 5,000-meter relay.
